en_US_text: Edit Mode: Drag widgets to reposition, drag edges to resize. Click the X to remove a widget.
zh_text: 编辑模式：拖拽重新定位，拖拽边缘调整大小。点击 X 移除小部件。
current_local_text: Edit Mode: Drag widgets to reposition, drag edges to resize. Click the X to remove a widget.

en_US_text: Reset dashboard to default layout? This cannot be undone.
zh_text: 重置仪表板到默认布局？这无法撤销。
current_local_text: Reset dashboard to default layout? This cannot be undone.

zh_text: 您的 IRC 网络概览

en_US_text: Sign in to manage your IRC network
zh_text: 登录以管理您的 IRC 网络
current_local_text: Sign in to manage your IRC network

en_US_text: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app, or use a backup code.
zh_text: 从您的认证器应用输入6位代码，或使用备份代码。
current_local_text: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app, or use a backup code.
